Title: S5 Ep. 212 Christian Flowers & Daniel Conti
Description:
Christian Flowers and Daniel Conti were the summer UCF #videoproduction and #editing #interns with The Intern Whisperer. Tune in and give a list to these two share their dreams, goals and their own opinions about the Future of Work.  Their #mentoring advice, hardest lesson that taught them A LOT, and what they are most #grateful for are touching.  Congratulations on graduating Daniel. Go Knights!

The Intern Whisperer Podcast is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Increasing diversity through #Skills based #DiversityEquityInclusion #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike.

Sign up to be an #Employer4Change that invests in their #intern talent and employees.  Want a break? Play our game, Intern Pursuit Game on Steam.  Thank you to our sponsor Cat 5 Studios.
